description: Now for HP TouchPad webOs 3.X! Available in English. If your item is lost or stolen you will have the vital information available at your finger tips! DigiSerial is the best app to store information about items around your house. You can keep pictures, model, serial, warranty information, where it was purchased and when. You can list parts that need to be replaced ever so often and where to get them. DigiSerial integrates with your phone's contacts and calendar so you can be reminded of when the warranty runs out or parts need to be replaced. You can add an unlimited number of categories to organize your list in preferences. View all the items in a filter list or by their category. Friendly support always included. From the menu, tap suggestions to send us ideas for future updates to DigiSerial!
